data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lucañas, Cristian C., Lit, Ireneo L. (2018): Oligotomidae (Insecta: Embioptera) of Mt. Makiling, Los Baños, Philippines, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4415 (1): 173-182, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4415.1.9|6 occurrences
